title: Full School Curriculum
contentSummary:
Parent Overview:
The LKG Scholar Program is a perfect blend of early academics and joyful exploration. We fully align with your child’s school syllabus — supporting every subject, school-given test, assignment, and project with guided, creative reinforcement. This stage focuses on strengthening literacy, numeracy, personal skills, and creative expression.

Subjects include English, Hindi, Maths, EVS, Art, GK, Fine Motor Skills, Storytelling, Music, and more — all delivered in structured, easy-to-follow weekly learning modules.

What makes us different:

- Structured Rayastra’s kit with all expert learning amenities at your home
- Personalized teacher-parent meetings and feedback sessions
- Full support for school-given classwork, homework, and tests
- Daily themes, visual stories, and creativity boosters
- Parent+Child Progress Dashboard for simple tracking
- Merit Badges for creativity, discipline, reading, and more
- Builds school-readiness with imagination, structure, and fun

title: Computer Science
contentSummary:
Parent Overview:
LKG learners begin understanding how to solve problems like young coders! Our CodeVoyagers program introduces basic logic, sequence, and directions through screen-free and interactive methods. The foundation of computational thinking is laid through puzzles, movement games, and storytelling with commands.

Your child starts thinking like a computer — “what comes next,” “which way to go,” and “what happens when...?”

What makes us different:

- Structured Rayastra’s kit with all expert learning amenities at your home
- Personalized teacher-parent meetings and feedback sessions
- Directional play (left/right, forward/backward), sorting, logical patterns
- Screen-light puzzles, visual cards, and command games
- Brain Gym & Logic Vault to boost early coding IQ
- Parent+Child Dashboard to track tech readiness
- Lays the base for coding competitions and logical fluency

title: Spoken & Written English
contentSummary:
Parent Overview:
In LKG, we expand your child’s spoken English, build stage comfort, and begin formal language structure gently. This program focuses on accent clarity, phonics, show-and-tell, vocabulary building, and early writing patterns (tracing and pre-words). Language becomes fun, expressive, and confidence-boosting.

Through guided speech practice and themed conversation tools, we help your child speak clearly, confidently, and creatively.

What makes us different:

- Structured Rayastra’s kit with all expert learning amenities at your home
- Personalized teacher-parent meetings and feedback sessions
- Spoken English focus: correct accent, expressions, vocabulary banks
- Role plays, show-and-tell, rhyme-based sentence practice
- Writing prep: line tracing, shape drawing, letter formation
- Lights, Camera, Confidence! video tasks for kids
- Optional multi language training - may it be French, German, or any other..
- Builds early fluency, confidence, and love for communication

title: Mathematics
contentSummary:
Parent Overview:
LKG MathMagicians begin building fluency with numbers, shapes, patterns, and everyday math. The program uses interactive games and kits to introduce counting, measuring, comparing, and math talk in daily life. This isn’t textbook math — this is thinking math.

We turn math into a hands-on adventure with kits that include blocks, color-coded cards, measuring cups, and more.

What makes us different:

- Structured Rayastra’s kit with all expert learning amenities at your home
- Personalized teacher-parent meetings and feedback sessions
- Counting, ordering, comparing numbers and sizes
- Introduction to calendar, time of day, weight and volume basics
- Real-life math: setting the table, organizing blocks, shopping pretend play
- Brain Gym challenges and Merit Badges for math mastery
- Makes children fall in love with logic and real-world numbers
